title: Why am I so utterly obsessed with One Direction? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because you liked their song. Because their genre is your type. Because they make beautiful music. Because they're famous. Because they're human. Because you like them. Because they're nice. Because they're bad. Because they're handsome. Because they're male. Because they're legends. Because they're unique. Because a lot of people like them. Because they're something you really really like---including the songs, the tune, the lyrics, their faces--everything. Or maybe because you are encountering that teen phase on where you're super obssessed with 1D. I don't want to sound rude but honestly, I don't know. No one knows why you're obssessed with them, because I'm not you and other humans are definitely not you. Only you would know the answer to that question. But I've listed a few good reasons on why you might be obsessed with them, it's listed above. Hope it helps :)
Your obsessed with one direction,I'm obsessed with Becky g. Obbessions happen because the thing is too good you can't stop obsessing over it!
